Description: Aggregated show-level single tickets by city for Alberta Ballet productions.
Access Method: CSV on shared drive / data lake (e.g., history_city_sales.csv).
Update Frequency: Ad hoc / after each season load.

Description: Performance- and ticket-level data: ticket type, price, channel, timestamps, promo codes, comps.
Access Method: Direct DB connection or API; secured credentials.

Description: Setup tables for productions, seasons, venues, and capacities.
Access Method: DB/API or scheduled CSV exports.

Description: Patron profiles, purchase history, segmentation, email permissions.
Access Method: CRM UI + API or scheduled exports.

Description: Email campaigns, sends, opens, clicks, unsubscribes.
Access Method: Platform APIs (e.g., Mailchimp/WordFly) or CSV exports.

Description: Paid media performance: spend, impressions, clicks, conversions per campaign.
Access Method: Meta/Google Ads APIs or agency reports.

Description: Planned and actual spend by production and city.
Access Method: Excel/Google Sheets in shared drive.

Description: Artistic information: premiere vs revival, run_type, guest stars, collaborators.
Access Method: Spreadsheets or internal database.

Description: Seat maps and capacity by price zone and configuration.
Access Method: Static CSV or database table; occasionally updated.

Description: Alberta unemployment, CPI, GDP and related macro indicators.
Access Method: Download from Statistics Canada / Alberta Govt portals.

Description: Daily temperature, precipitation, extreme weather flags for Calgary and Edmonton.
Access Method: Environment Canada API or CSV downloads.

Description: Major events (Stampede, concerts, NHL games) that may compete with performances.
Access Method: Manual spreadsheets or scraped event listings.

Description: Population estimates and visitor volumes for Calgary and Edmonton.
Access Method: StatsCan and Travel Alberta downloads.

Description: Search interest indices for production titles and ballet-related terms.
Access Method: Google Trends UI/API wrapper; CSV exports.

Description: Predicted attendance, event rank, and demand features for events in Calgary/Edmonton during run windows.
Access Method: PredictHQ REST API with API key (PREDICTHQ_API_KEY); Python client or CSV exports.

Description: Estimated local consumer spend driven by events during run windows.
Access Method: PredictHQ Spend API with API key; aggregated by location and date range.

Description: Severe weather alerts and advisories for Alberta cities.
Access Method: PredictHQ API filtered to severe-weather category.
Update Frequency: On-demand or daily during run window.

Description: Bloomberg Nanos Canadian Consumer Confidence Index with demographic breakdowns and expectations.
Access Method: Nanos Research weekly reports; CSV export.

Description: Nanos survey data on consumer financial outlook, cost of living impacts, and housing worry.
Access Method: Nanos Research quarterly reports; CSV export.

Description: Bank of Canada commodity price indices including Energy (A.ENER) for Alberta economy tracking.
Access Method: Bank of Canada data downloads.

Description: Monthly Consumer Price Index data for inflation adjustment calculations.
Access Method: Bank of Canada / Statistics Canada downloads.

Description: 2021 Census data for Calgary CMA including population, demographics, income, and housing.
Access Method: Statistics Canada Census downloads.

Description: 2021 Census data for Edmonton CMA including population, demographics, income, and housing.
Access Method: Statistics Canada Census downloads.
